comment: she is a great professor. turned in a major assignment in late and she didn't take points off. if you do the work right you will do good in this class. I have her as an 8am and she makes it less dreadful to go to her class. major essay as final but she is very helpful throughout the whole process. 100% recommend!!!

Dr. Bramblett is very kind. She responds to emails quick and is always willing to answer any questions and offer support. As long as you put in the effort, you will be fine (she isn't a harsh grader). There is a major research project for ENGL1102, but even the rubric was decided among the entire class. She truly cares for students, take her class!

Dr. Bramblett is a very engaging and personable teacher. She is genuinely passionate about what she is teaching and will work hard to curate the experience of each individual student. Her expectations are clear she gives great feedback, she is also very understanding and flexible. Her class isn't too hard and if you put in the work you will pass.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I took her class for my first semester at KSU. Her class was always nice to attend. It isn't hectic, I actually found it to be a break from stress from my other classes, she has 3 major grades which are essays, but she walks you through the prior weeks so it is not bad. You do need the textbook, but it is free and the readings are straightforward.
